title: The Peoples of Africa
brief_description: Provides an economic, sociological and geographical study of the various peoples of Africa. Describes the influence that the Arabian and Negro elements along with the Bushmen, Pygmy and Indian contingents have had on African development. Also indicates the importance of European immigration. No other credits available.
